articles.author: Joe Donnelly
articles.title: Rise of the Ronin sits somewhere between Assassin's Creed and Nioh, but the action RPG's rhythm combat took me back to a 27-year-old PS1 classic - Gamesradar
articles.description: Preview | Team Ninja's latest PS5 exclusive is the studio's most ambitious yet – can it pull off everything it hopes to achieve?
articles.content: Rise of the Ronin is Team Ninja's indirect follow-up to the studio's esteemed ARPGs Nioh (2017) and Nioh 2 (2020). It's the next significant PS5 exclusive of 2024, and it's set in the "Bakumatsu" per… [+7018 chars]

articles.author: Marion Willingham
articles.title: The Toast of the craft world - Financial Times
articles.description: The British fashion brand’s New Makers programme spotlights five great artisans
articles.content: British brand Toast strives to make clothes that last; its resident menders even darn, patch and appliqué garments to give worn items extra life. This commitment to craftsmanship is also true of Toas… [+3461 chars]
